content: As some of you know I am new to the ADA field and waiting to attend either the 14 Sierra or Juliet school. I just talked to a new neighbor of mine that just came off active duty as a 14 Juliet and she said that 14 Sierras might be getting phased out , has anyone on here heard of that ?
reply: As some of you know I am new to the ADA field and waiting to attend either the 14 Sierra or Juliet school. I just talked to a new neighbor of mine that just came off active duty as a 14 Juliet and she said that 14 Sierras might be getting phased out , has anyone on here heard of that ?
title: 14 Sierra Phasing Out ?

content: As with any ADA system, it is probably in a constant upgrade or replacement mode - First was quad .50 machineguns, then twin 40mm on a chaffe chasis, then a vulcan 20mm mounted on an M-113 track, then Redeye missiles followed by Stingers, and Chaparrals mounted on tracks, now the Avenger . . . But one thing is for certain - It will be replaced by the next generation of ADA, unless all future enemies stop flying jets and copters - - so expect to cross-train and OJT - - Wandering and Wondering
reply: As with any ADA system, it is probably in a constant upgrade or replacement mode - First was quad .50 machineguns, then twin 40mm on a chaffe chasis, then a vulcan 20mm mounted on an M-113 track, then Redeye missiles followed by Stingers, and Chaparrals mounted on tracks, now the Avenger . . .
